scripts.build:react: for d in applications/*; do if [ -d "$d" ]; then pnpm -C "$d" build || exit 1; fi; done
scripts.postbuild:react: for d in applications/*; do name="$(basename "$d")"; out="public/$name"; rm -rf "$out"; mkdir -p "$out"; if [ -d "$d/dist" ]; then cp -R "$d/dist/"* "$out/"; fi; done
scripts.build: pnpm run build:react && pnpm run build:zola && pnpm run postbuild:react
